news.title: Bitcoin jumps nearly $14,000 in three days on Trump's crypto reserve announcement
news.summary: President Donald Trump teased new details about the highly anticipated strategic bitcoin reserve. Cryptocurrencies rallied over the weekend after President Donald Trump tease new details.

news.title: Amazon to bring palm-scanning tech to NYU Langone Health facilities
news.summary: NYU Langone Health patients will be able to check in for appointments using Amazon's palm-scanning technology. Amazon will be available at NYU Langone in New York, New Jersey and Staten Island.

news.title: Domino's Pizza finally launches stuffed crust to keep customers away from rivals
news.summary: Thirty years after Pizza Hut introduced stuffed crust, Domino's is introducing its own take. The pizza chain is introducing stuffed crust to its menu.

news.title: EU leaders prepare 'concrete' measures on defense financing, sources say
news.summary: The EU is expected to announce "concrete" measures on boosting defense financing this week. Europe and the U.S. clash over support for Ukraine.

news.title: Warren Buffett calls Trump's tariffs a tax on goods, says 'the Tooth Fairy doesn't pay 'em'
news.summary: "Tariffs are actually, we've had a lot of experience with them. They're an act of war, to some degree," Buffett said.

news.title: What’s worth streaming in March 2025: ‘Daredevil,’ John Mulaney, March Madness and more
news.summary: ‘The Righteous Gemstones’ returns to Max, Disney revives ‘Daredevil’ and Apple reloads its lineup.

news.title: Stock investors had better hope these Americans keep propping up the economy
news.summary: The wealthy are spending, but many consumers are pulling back — and the stock market is fragile. The wealthy are Spending, but Many Consumers are Pulling Back. The Stock Market is Fragile.

news.title: ‘Why am I so afraid to retire?’ I’m 60 and lost $1.2 million in a divorce. Can I rebuild my life?
news.summary: “If the rule of 4% is applied, I could use savings and the proceeds from my house sale to buy a condo, and at 62 draw $110,000 per year,” he says.

news.title: What Nvidia’s market valuation says about where the stock will be in 5 years
news.summary: A good company whose stock is overvalued can still be a great disappointment. A good company with a great stock is still likely to be overvalued.

news.title: The economy’s at risk of plunging into an air pocket, says JPMorgan. What that would mean for stocks now and in the future.
news.summary: JPMorgan: Investors are brushing aside the possibilities of more turbulence to come for the U.S. economy and potential fallout for markets.
